Feedback.Name: John Doe
Feedback.Message: Had a Good sleep in Book King! The bed was super clean and comfortable. Definitely a 10/10 Experience!

Feedback.Name: Jane Samson
Feedback.Message: Definitely Coming back again if ever, this will be my first choice!

Feedback.Name: Cris Luo
Feedback.Message: It was the best vacation of my Life! I wanted to take more vacations.
